committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain public lands in Oconto and Marinette Counties, Wisconsin.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey any portion of specified lands in Oconto and Marinette Counties, Wisconsin, to any citizen of the United States who claims and demonstrates possession of such portion of land.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain public lands in Oconto and Marinette Counties, Wisconsin.
